content.raw: Wow, we had old stuff lingering around.
content.html: Wow, we had old stuff lingering around.

content.raw: Also, GNU recommends keeping a list or range of years in the copyright notice (ie. 2012-2013) [reference](http://www.gnu.org/prep/maintain/html_node/Copyright-Notices.html). I'm neutral on the matter.
content.html: Also, GNU recommends keeping a list or range of years in the copyright notice (ie. 2012-2013) reference. I'm neutral on the matter.
